description: In this advanced analysis of principles and methods for creating dances, students survey current trends in dance performance as well as choreograph new works. Prerequisite: Dance 231. Offered Spring 2008 and alternate years.
name: Advanced Choreography
prerequisites: Dance 231. Offered Spring 2008 and alternate years.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Dance 231. Offered Spring 2008 and alternate years.
